title: Iron Kobra - Might And Magic   2015  ak61
description:
The band Iron Kobra was founded in 2008 by Don Viper, Sir Serpent and Lord Python. After a 
short time Commander Conda, who was a session drummer at first, became a full member as well.

Inspired by the great Metal heroes of the 80's Iron Kobra started to play heavy speed Metal in the old german way.
 

The first demo CULT OF THE SNAKE was released in the beginning of 2009 and has now been released on tape via Dying Victims Productions as well.

 An EP by the name BATTLESWORD followed in 2010 and was met with great praise and success.
 

After many great gigs and hours on the road, the band had to part ways with Commander Conda
in 2011 and found a replacement in Ringo Snake - an able warrior who know puts steam into the
death machine. A single, AVENGER, was recorded and pressed onto black wax, before 
marching towards their first studio album, DUNGEON MASTERS, which was released in 2012. 

Now the band is pressing towards their second, album, MIGHT & MAGIC, which will be 
released in early 2015. 



 MIGHT & MAGIC - 2015
